h2_title: Where To Use The Keeness of Tiger in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The easiest one of these Tallies to find is the one at the Crouching Tiger Temple, as it is in the arena where you fought the Tiger Vanguard.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeness_of_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Keeness of Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Keeness of Tiger in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The easiest one of these Tallies to find is the one at the Crouching Tiger Temple, as it is in the arena where you fought the Tiger Vanguard.
